document.full_text: authorities pressed a mandatory evacuation on wednesday in flood-hit parts of minot, north dakota, and south dakota's governor urged residents to evacuate parts of the capital ahead of rising flows from the swollen missouri river.
document.title: north and south dakota prepare flood evacuations
lines_and_colors: authorities pressed a mandatory evacuation on wednesday in flood-hit parts of minot, north dakota, and south dakota's governor urged residents to evacuate parts of the capital ahead of rising flows from the swollen missouri river.
